brew.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Every beer on the menu was brewed locally.
brew.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if a drink of tea or coffee is brewing, the taste is getting into the hot water
brew.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He read the paper while the tea brewed.
brew.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to make a drink of tea or coffee
brew.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a drink that is brewed, especially tea
brew.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: beer, or a can or glass of beer
brew.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: a cold brew in a frosty glass
brew.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: The band played a strange brew of rock, jazz, and country music.
